original_text: He will look at the walls of the house. He will look for a green or red mark. If the mark goes into the wall, 38 the priest will leave the house. He will shut it up for seven days.
korean_text: 그 색점을 볼 때에 그 집 벽에 푸르거나 붉은 무늬의 색점이 있어 벽보다 우묵하면

sentences.original_text: He will look at the walls of the house.
He will look for a green or red mark.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 녹색 또는 붉은색 자국을 찾을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: If the mark goes into the wall, 38
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 자국이 벽 안으로 들어가면, 38

sentences.original_text: the priest will leave the house.
He will shut it up for seven days.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그것을 이레 동안 닫아 둘 것입니다.
